text: Christian Manrique Díaz (born 2 October 1998) is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for Cypriot club Olympiakos Nicosia as a left back. ==Club career== Born in Móstoles, Manrique graduated from the youth academy of Rayo Vallecano and was promoted to the B-team on 15 June 2017. On 28 August, he made his debut, coming on as a substitute for Victor Villacañas in a 2−1 defeat against CF Trival Valderas. On 17 December, he scored his first goal for the team in a 3−0 victory against CD San Fernando de Henares. On 11 July 2018, Manrique moved abroad and joined Cypriot First Division club AC Omonia. On 16 September, he made his debut for the club, coming on as a last minute substitute for Jaílson in a 1−0 win against Enosis Neon Paralimni FC. ==International career== Manrique has been capped by Spain at under-19 level. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1"|Rayo Vallecano B |2017–18 |Tercera División |29||1||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||29||1 |- |rowspan="3"|Omonia |2018–19 |rowspan="2"|Cypriot First Division |19||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||20||0 |- |2019–20 |0||0||2||0||colspan="2"|—||2||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !19!!0!!3!!0!!0!!0!!22!!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !48!!1!!3!!0!!0!!0!!51!!1 |} ==References== ==External links== *AC Omonia profile * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Spanish footballers Category:Tercera División players Category:Rayo Vallecano B players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:AC Omonia players Category:Olympiakos Nicosia players Category:Spain youth international footballers Category:Spanish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Cyprus Category:Spanish people of Cuban descent
